message.content:
cs.IT, cs.DS, cs.NI, cs.SI, cs.CC 

Reasoning: The paper deals with the design and construction of regenerating codes, which is a topic in information theory (cs.IT). It also involves the use of coding theory and graph theory concepts, which are relevant to distributed systems (cs.DS) and networked information systems (cs.NI). The repair procedure and repair bandwidth calculations are related to system implementation (cs.SI) and performance evaluation (cs.CC).
